text: mama ithin wadi sellam danne nathi gaman walata kiyala hithagena thamayi ehema karanne.
meyata plasmayak oona wenawa.
laga nathi eka monawa unath hithata wada denawa..
awurudu pahak eka jobaka hitiyama hondato ma athi.
sama agaharuwada dinakama janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathwena kabinat raswima eeye (11) nopawathwini.
sathyawabodhayata manga wati aththe aththakilamathanuyogaya haraha nowana bawa ohu pasak kota atha.
thawa mama dakka uthure aandukaraya, giya awurudde wage mathaka, dakunu aprikanu mahakomasarista kiyanawa mandelage prathimawak uthure hadanna.
sit ekak aragena nidagena yanna..
man dethun widak sudesiya sewen ooka ahuwa.
manda mul dina deka kisiweku mehi darunu bawa nosithu nisaya.
aadare gonu kara kiyannata nohakiyi
ohu nidahas karanna.
